title: FS: T206 Cobb Red Portrait Polar Bear SGC 40
author: 823dek

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Cobb Red Portrait Polar Bear SGC 40

posts.post_content:
GLWS Dan, and speedy recovery to your bro-in-law!

[img]https://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=400764&stc=1&d=1589900707[/img][img]https://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=400767&stc=1&d=1589900785[/img]

I took the post part down to where I was helping my bro-in-law with a van because I didnt want to look like I was doing this to sell the card. So kind of you in taking a moment to upload the pic for me. He is a great guy who has always helped when he could, so I have no problem with helping him..you're a good man in doing so...I remember us doing a few things together in the past ,so very nice to hear from you really.

THE RED IN THIS CARD IS FANTASTIC....VERY  DEEP RED AND NO CREASES
